Enumeration Type Documentation

enum rbx_ServoProp
 

Servo Properties.

Enumeration values:
rbxServoProp_POS  current position (relative to p0pos)
rbxServoProp_MINPOS  minimum position (relative to p0pos)
rbxServoProp_MAXPOS  maximum position (relative to p0pos)
rbxServoProp_INITPOS  initial position (relative to p0pos)
rbxServoProp_P0POS  physical 0 position
rbxServoProp_MAXSPD  maximum speed
rbxServoProp_ACCEL  acceleration
rbxServoProp_DECEL  deceleration
rbxServoProp_INVERT  invert status (0-not inverted, 1-inverted)
rbxServoProp_PINNED  pinned status (0-not pinned, 1-pinned)
rbxServoProp_POWER  power status (as a percent, 0-100)
rbxServoProp_ABSI  absolute value of average servo electrical current

Function Documentation

int rbxServo_getPort (  int  podHandle,
int  servoId,
int *  port
) 
 

Gets a servo's physical output port number on the device (one-based).

Parameters:
[in] podHandle a handle to the servo's parent Pod
[in] servoId the servo's ID (one-based)
[out] port pointer to an int that receives the servo's physical port on the device
Returns:
RBX_E_SERVO_ID_INVALID if the specified servo ID is invalid
RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Pod handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes

int rbxServo_getMod (  int  podHandle,
int  servoId,
int *  mod
) 
 

Gets a servo's modification number.

This number is incremented whenever any of the servo's properties change.

This function is typically used to determine if any of a servo's properties have changed.

Parameters:
[in] podHandle a handle to the servo's parent Pod
[in] servoId the servo's ID (one-based)
[out] mod pointer to an int that receives the servo's mod
Returns:
RBX_E_SERVO_ID_INVALID if the specified servo ID is invalid
RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Pod handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes
See also:
rbx_ServoProp

int rbxServo_getPropertyValue (  int  podHandle,
int  servoId,
enum rbx_ServoProp  prop,
int *  propVal
) 
 

Gets the value of the specified servo property.

Parameters:
[in] podHandle a handle to the servo's parent Pod
[in] servoId the servo's ID (one-based)
[in] prop the desired servo property
[out] propVal pointer to an int that receives the servo property's value
Returns:
RBX_E_SERVO_PROP_INVALID if the specified servo property is invalid
RBX_E_SERVO_ID_INVALID if the specified servo ID is invalid
RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Pod handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes
